definition: lit. cloud and rain/fig. sexual intercourse
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: If you likejmaking love at midnight, in Network the dunes of the cape.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢云雨缠绵在那午夜的海角沙丘之上。

sentences.english: It's the reason after having sex with someone, you're probably more inclined to form an emotional attachment.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么你和某人云雨之后更容易产生情感依赖。

sentences.english: After cloud, just see a sunny day.
sentences.chinese: 云雨过后，才见一方晴天。

sentences.english: The mercy of God is beautiful in the time of affliction, as a cloud of rain in the time of drought.
sentences.chinese: 在患难时，天主的仁慈是甘饴的，有如大旱时的云雨。

definition: the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
to have cordial relations with each other/to have sexual intercourse
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
to produce clouds with one turn of the hand and rain with another (idiom); fig. to shift one's ground/tricky and inconstant/to make love
overwhelmed (with joy, sorrow etc)/to feel transported
